mpu_wugen.h File Reference
CSL ARCH Module » A15 » MPU WUGEN

This file contains the API prototypes for configuring MPU_WUGEN for ARM Cortex-A15 on AM57x and TDA2xx SOC's. More...

Functions

void MPU_WUGEN_Init (void)
 This API is used to initialize MPU_WUGEN. All wakeup events will be disabled after initialization. More...
 
void MPU_WUGEN_0_DisableAll (void)
 Disables all wakeup events for CPU0. More...
 
void MPU_WUGEN_1_DisableAll (void)
 Disables all wakeup events for CPU1. More...
 
void MPU_WUGEN_0_Interrupt_Lookup (void)
 Configure wakeup events by looking up the CPU0 interrupt settings. More...
 
void MPU_WUGEN_0_Enable (uint16_t intrNum)
 This API enables the CPU0 wakeup event for requested interrupt. More...
 
void MPU_WUGEN_1_Enable (uint16_t intrNum)
 This API enables the CPU1 wakeup event for requested interrupt. More...
 
void MPU_WUGEN_0_Disable (uint16_t intrNum)
 This API disables the CPU0 wakeup event for requested interrupt. More...
 
void MPU_WUGEN_1_Disable (uint16_t intrNum)
 This API disables the CPU1 wakeup event for requested interrupt. More...
 

Detailed Description

This file contains the API prototypes for configuring MPU_WUGEN for ARM Cortex-A15 on AM57x and TDA2xx SOC's.
